title: 3 and Out - Seahawks in Decline, More Urban Fallout, Big Ben Pivot Problems, Week 5 Preview, 3 for the $$$, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Seahawks in Decline, More Urban Fallout, Big Ben Pivot Problems, Week 5 Preview, 3 for the $$$, Mailbag
description:
John gives his take on an UGLY Rams Thursday Night win over the Seahawks, why Seattle's best days are behind them, his take on the final fallout for Urban Meyer over his viral video infidelity scandal, how the transition of NFL ownership from millionaires to billionaires has transformed the business of the NFL, why the Steelers could be in for a prolonged slide after Big Ben retires, and previews some Week 5 games he has his eyes on. He also gives his quick takes on Week 5 NFL matchups, runs his 3 for the Money NFL games by Action Network sharp Stuckey, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
